name: Nodebb-theme-rocket-redux
tagline: A theme with a card-based design for NodeBB forums. Mobile enabled.
body:
Rocket Theme for NodeBB
=========================

+ A theme with a card-based design for NodeBB forums. Based off persona theme and rocket theme rewritten by julianlam.  Mobile enabled. 

+ The "redux" version is the original
rocket theme re-written with the [Persona theme](https://github.com/nodebb/nodebb-theme-persona) as
a base.

## Screenshots of original by [julianlam](https://github.com/julianlam)

![Main Index](./screenshots/1.png)

![New Topic Creation Dropdown](./screenshots/2.png)

## Installation

Install via the "ACP/Plugins" page, or by executing `npm install nodebb-theme-rocket-redux`

## Credits

Thanks to [Edi Gil](https://dribbble.com/EdiGil) for the homepage newsfeed design.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
